solution_line_template: First find the cost of {num_bread_slices} slices of bread: ${bread_slice_cost}/slice * {num_bread_slices} slices = $<<{bread_slice_cost}*{num_bread_slices}={cost_bread}>>{cost_bread}

Then add the cost of one slice each of ham and cheese: ${cost_bread} + ${ham_slice_cost} + ${cheese_slice_cost} = $<<{cost_bread}+{ham_slice_cost}+{cheese_slice_cost}={total_cost_dollars}>>{total_cost_dollars}
